title: Pixel 3 Failed to load/verify boot images - Fastboot mode
content:
Hi

My USB C Port on my pixel 3 was not working reliable anymore. I did order a replacement port and replaced it. Now the device starts up in Fastboot Mode with the "Enter Reason: failed to load/verify boot images"

I connected it to my mac and downloaded the android platform SDK. It responds here.
When I try to flash the bootloader, I get the following error
FAILED (remote: 'error getting device locked state No Response')

I think this error comes up, because I did not unlock the bootloader. But I cannot unlock the bootloader because android does not boot up.
I did not enable USB debugging, and I cannot enable it now.



Any suggestions?

Thanks for your help
Janis
